lead_paragraph: Giampiero Ventura, a 68-year-old who has never won a major title and spent much of his career in the lower divisions, was named on Tuesday as the next Italy coach to replace Antonio Conte after Euro 2016.

headline.print_headline: Veteran Ventura Named as Next Italy Coach
headline.main: Veteran Ventura Named as Next Italy Coach
